description.raw:
This is another API change. It affects the way a Node is created. Now, a node will only accept one optional parameter of type `NodeOptions` that contains all options to be applied to your node. For now, the only options allowed are the ability to change the default namespace and partition name. 

This change will allow to extend the number of options in the future without breaking the API.

CI results:

* [Trusty is happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64/28/).
* [Homebrew is happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/22/).
* [Windows is happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/59/).
description.html:
This is another API change. It affects the way a Node is created. Now, a node will only accept one optional parameter of type NodeOptions that contains all options to be applied to your node. For now, the only options allowed are the ability to change the default namespace and partition name.

This change will allow to extend the number of options in the future without breaking the API.

CI results:

  • Trusty is happy.
  • Homebrew is happy.
  • Windows is happy.

title: Node options
